task_description: Predict ICU mortality based on the longitudinal hourly lab measurements of the patients since their admission
Predict whether the LOS exceed 7 days based on the longitudinal hourly lab measurements of the patients since their admission
Use the past 6 hours of lab measurements and static demographics (matching patient id) to predict the 4 ventilation intervention statuses during the 4-hour period after 6 hours.
Predict hospital mortality based on the longitudinal hourly lab measurements of the patients since their admission
Predict whether the LOS exceed 3 days based on the longitudinal hourly lab measurements of the patients since their admission
Use the past 6 hours of lab measurements and static demographics (matching patient id) to predict the 4 vasopressor intervention statuses during the 4-hour period after 6 hours.
